name: Adventures Of The Secret Book
description:
Experience dreamy adventure of the secret book in endless dungeon with Little Jimmy.

Little Jimmy is an innocent child who loves to read unusual adventures of his secret book before going to sleep. Play as the Jimmy's hero while dreaming and discover deep dungeons and beyond!

Features:
• Endless maze adventure
• Leveling & updates
• Custom maze generator
• English & Slovak localization
• Beautiful-spooky & original soundtracks

Created during the one-week gamejam - 'stay home' edition.

3D Artist & Environment: Kristian Kollar
Music & Sounds: Patrik Jesko
Programming & Level Design: Matej Vanco

Jam Page: https://itch.io/jam/bratislava-game-jam-session-stay-home-edition

Thank you and enjoy!
#puzzle #adventure #endless #children-friendly
